Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class Kitchen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverSide.sharedRegions.Kitchen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Kitchen
extends java.lang.Thread
    Where the chef watches the news, starts and continues the preparation, presents the portions, alerts the waiter and cleans up. Where the waiter hands the note to the chef and collects the portions .
    Author:
    Martim Neves, Tiago Dias

      void cleanUp()
      Chef clean up and closes his service.
      void collectPortion()
      Notifies the chef that the waiter has collected the portion Updates internal state of the waiter to WAITING_FOR_PORTION.

    • Method Detail

      • startPreparation

        public void startPreparation()
        Chef starts preparation. Notifies the waiter that preparation just started. Update the chef state to PREPARING_THE_COURSE.

      • proceedToPresentation

        public void proceedToPresentation()
        Update the chef state to DISHING_THE_PORTIONS.

      • haveNextPortionReady

        public void haveNextPortionReady()
        Update the chef state to DISHING_THE_PORTIONS.

      • continuePreparation

        public void continuePreparation()
        Chef continues course preparation. Update the chef state to PREPARING_THE_COURSE.

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Chef clean up and closes his service.

      • hasTheOrderBeenCompleted

        public boolean hasTheOrderBeenCompleted()
        Checks if the order has been completed
        Returns:
        if the order has been completed

      • haveAllPortionsBeenDelivered

        public boolean haveAllPortionsBeenDelivered()
        Checks if all portions been delivered.
        Returns:
        if all portions been delivered.

      • handNoteToTheChef

        public void handNoteToTheChef()
        Waiter hands the note to the chef and waits for the chef to start the preparation. Notifies the chef that the note has been handed. Updates internal state of the waiter to PLACING_THE_ORDER.

      • collectPortion

        public void collectPortion()
        Notifies the chef that the waiter has collected the portion Updates internal state of the waiter to WAITING_FOR_PORTION.

      • watchTheNews

        public void watchTheNews()
        Chef waits for the note to be delivered by the waiter. Update the chef state to WAITING_FOR_AN_ORDER.

      • haveAllClientsBeenServed

        public boolean haveAllClientsBeenServed()
        Checks if all the clients have been served.
        Returns:
        if all the clients have been served
